attributes.action: Call on George Osborne to stand down as Chancellor of the Exchequer
attributes.background: It has now become clear that the  national living wage will make care in the home unaffordable. Surely this sort of thing should have been checked before the budget, and clearly George Osborne is not competent to fulfill his present role.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105353

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
